body:
Whenever I play Avicus I always get into a game where somebody looks like they are in the ground, misplaced, flying 1 block above the ground, or in a wall. 

On some servers people tell others to do /fix to fix the problem.

I think Avicus should add /fix to fix the problem. Tell me what you think.

title: [Sug]/fix

replies.body: As far as I know /fix is a command that repairs items, not anything to do with this and the 1 block flying or in the ground is just lag that can't be helped it should only last at most. Also the player's hit-boxes are still where they should be so you can usually still find ways to hit them. :)

replies.body: This is a client bug depending on how well the player is in sync with the connection with the server, so a command won't be able to change that.
